definition: during or for the length of one night, lasting, open, or operating through the whole night
details:
adverb
- during or for the length of one night
= example: during or for the length of one night
- happening in a short time or with great speed
= example: happening in a short time or with great speed
adjective
- lasting, open, or operating through the whole night
= synonyms: nightlong, all-night
